text: Franck Lavaud (February 16, 1903 â€“ February 27, 1988) was a Haitian general and politician who was an acting head of state during two terms: from January 11, 1946 until August 16, 1946 and from May 10, 1950 until December 6, 1950. Both times he led a military junta along with Paul Magloire and Antoine Levelt. Category:1903 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Presidents of Haiti
title: Franck Lavaud
